description: Complete system overview detailing the modular architecture, component interactions, and high-level system design of the PhoenixRooivalk counter-drone system
Detailed documentation of the core algorithms for RF jamming, GPS spoofing, and signal disruption mechanisms, including logic flows and implementation details
Technical documentation of drone detection systems, sensor integration, and threat analysis algorithms, including data flow between detection and response components
Documentation of the modular system architecture, component interfaces, and integration patterns for customizable deployment configurations
